benchmark_details.name: HR-MultiWOZ: A Task Oriented Dialogue (TOD) Dataset for HR LLM Agent
benchmark_details.overview: HR-MultiWOZ is the first labeled open-sourced conversation dataset in the HR domain for NLP research, comprising 550 fully-labeled conversations across 10 HR domains, aimed at evaluating/training LLM agents for HR applications.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate/train HR LLM agents using a dataset tailored for HR-specific task-oriented dialogue.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset does not contain task parts of the conversation.

data.source: Generated using a pipeline from expert-validated HR schemas and LLMs with minimal human involvement for annotation.
data.annotation: Mostly LLM-generated with some human labeling and verification.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human evaluations on a scale of 1 to 5.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better naturalness, clarity, and politeness.
methodology.validation: Human evaluations confirmed the quality and characteristics of the generated dialogues.

targeted_risks.harm: The synthetic data may reflect biases inherent in LLMs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Generated dialogues are based on synthetic user profiles to ensure privacy.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The dataset's generation follows rigorous internal security policies.
